title: Insecticidal potential of Bacillus thuringiensis, Beauveria bassiana and Metarhizium anisopliae individually and their synergistic effect with barazide against Spodoptera litura
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Anuja Sharma, Neelam Thakur, Abeer Hashem, Turki M. Dawoud, Elsayed Fathi Abd_Allah
